CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Microvast Holdings Inc is a technology innovator that designs, develops, and manufactures lithium-ion battery solutions. The company is renowned for its cutting-edge cell technology and its vertical integration capabilities which extend from core battery chemistry to battery packs.
